member.name: MFVideoLighting
member.summary: Describes the optimal lighting for viewing a particular set of video content.

member.name: MFVideoLighting.MFVideoLighting_office
member.summary: Medium brightness; for example, normal office lighting.

member.name: MFVideoLighting.MFVideoLighting_dim
member.summary: Dim; for example, a living room with a television and additional low lighting.

member.name: MFVideoLighting.MFVideoLighting_dark
member.summary: Dark; for example, a movie theater.

member.name: MFVideoLighting.MFVideoLighting_ForceDWORD
member.summary: Reserved. This member forces the enumeration type to compile as a DWORD value.
